events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your store but would like to request a refund as it does not fit me well.
The case was classified under Refund based on customer request regarding return of purchased item.
Support agent Emma has been assigned to handle the refund request for the jacket purchase.
Hello! Iâ€™m Emma, here to assist you with your refund request. Could you please provide your order number?
To proceed with the refund, please send us your order number and the reason for the return.
Thank you, the order number is 123456789. I want a refund because the jacket is too small despite ordering my usual size.
We can initiate the refund process immediately. Please send the jacket back using the prepaid return label we will email shortly.
Thanks for the quick response! I appreciate the prepaid label and will send the jacket back today.
We have received the returned jacket and completed your refund. The amount should appear on your card within 3-5 business days.
Just checking in to confirm you have received the refund. Please let us know if there is anything else we can assist with.
As the refund was processed successfully and customer confirmed receipt, we are closing this case now. Thank you!
